price: 39 Louange à Allah qui, malgré mon âge avancé, m’a fait don d’Ismaël et d’Isaac. Mon Seigneur entend si bien les prières.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي وَهَبَ لِي عَلَى ٱلۡكِبَرِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَسَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī wahaba lī ʿalā al-kibari is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa inna rabbī lasamīʿu al-duʿāi
